official_title: A bill to award a congressional gold medal to Joe Kittinger.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a gold medal to Joe Kittinger in recognition of his accomplishments as an aviation pioneer. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to provide for the sale of bronze duplicates of the medal.

titles.title: A bill to award a congressional gold medal to Joe Kittinger.
